text: Gerta von Ubisch (1882–1965) was a German physicist, geneticist, and botanist. She studied barley and found a genetic explanation for heterostyly. In 1933 she lost her position at Heidelberg University because of her Jewish heritage. == References == Category:1882 births Category:1965 deaths Category:German botanists Category:German geneticists Category:German physicists Category:German women physicists
title: Gerta von Ubisch
